channel.title: Friend log in problem
channel.description:
BASE: Delta Client: idk made by Jad
ok so wasnt sure where to post this cus idk if its server or client sided, but i have to problems.
Problem 1: when one of my friend logs in it says: Hi Im Chase has logged in
Then when he logs out it says: Hi Im Chase has logged in
how do i make it so when he logs out it says: Hi Im Chase has logged out _______________________________________ Problem 2: my second problem is when you right click on some one it says this: Attack Hi Im Chase Walk here Hi Im Chase Follow Hi Im Chase Trade Hi Im Chase

item.title: Friend log in problem
item.dc:creator: @imhewbrew imhewbrew
item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:352421”]Try this

Backup your files before you do it because i havent tested but it should work

1: Search for public void logout

2: Underneath that put

yell("" + playerName + " has just logged out");

Tell me if it works[/quote]
lmao ok well it didnt work like it spamed Matt has logged out like 4 time but i want it so when they log out the friends list thing says it

Read full topic

item.title: Friend log in problem
item.dc:creator: @imhewbrew imhewbrew
item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:352409”]It might help if you tell us the source & vision.
For the first problem, might be in the logout method, and the second, look in your client.java if its PI.[/quote]
Base: Delta
Client: it was made by Jad

Read full topic
